sentences.sContent: People who drop litter can be fined in some cities.
sentences.sCn: 在有些城市，乱扔垃圾的人会被罚款。

sentences.sContent: A litter of notes, papers, and textbooks were strewn on the desk.
sentences.sCn: 一堆笔记、考卷和课本乱七八糟地摊在桌子上。

sentences.sContent: The floor was littered with papers.
sentences.sCn: 地板上乱七八糟扔了许多报纸。

sentences.sContent: ...like they are not having their litter collected properly or the dustbins emptied...
...Obviously we ask all our customers to dispose of litter responsibly...

synos.tran: 垃圾；轿，担架；一窝（动物的幼崽）；凌乱

remMethod.val: 把little的“l”乱丢， 错拿成“r” → 乱扔东西

words.tran: 在街道或公共场所乱丢垃圾的人

trans.tranOther: waste paper, cans etc that people have thrown away and left on the ground in a public place
to leave waste paper, cans etc on the ground in a public place
